config_not_writable: Unable to create VotingPlugin config. Please ensure the modules/VotingPlugin directory is writable, and then disable + re-enable the module.
confirm_delete_vote_site: Are you sure you want to delete this vote site?
delete_site: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
icon_maximum: Icon must be a maximum of {{count}} characters
message: Message to display at top of Vote page (This can be left blank)
message_maximum: Your vote message must be a maximum of 2048 characters
name_max_64: Please ensure your site name is a maximum of 64 characters
no_vote_sites: No vote sites have been defined yet.
please_configure_module: Please configure the module in the file modules/VotingPlugin/config.php first.
site_name_maximum: Site name must be a maximum of 64 characters
site_name_minimum: Site name must be a minimum of 2 characters
site_url_maximum: Site URL must be a maximum of 255 characters
site_url_minimum: Site URL must be a minimum of 10 characters
url_max_256: Please ensure your site URL is a maximum of 256 characters
url_min_8: Please ensure your site URL is a minimum of 8 characters, including the preceding https://
